Talk4001: <snd:Sleep>Zzz... <sp:5:0:0>Fire and music to warm the soul...
Talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughL>I've been out here a long time, and I'm
happy to point you in the right direction,
if you're so inclined.
The places of note around here are to the
west, the east, and the north... So, where
are you headed, traveler?
Talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Tired_01>Hm... Is there anything else you'd like
to ask about?
Talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>West, huh? Well, that's the direction of
<clr:0000>Rito Village<clr:ffff>, for one thing.

<sp:3:0:2:0101>Oh, and that reminds me! The <clr:0000>Lucky
Clover Gazette<clr:ffff> was just established right
near there.
I hear their reporters are dogged in their
pursuit of the news. They travel all across
the land to find the biggest scoops!
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_00>If it's information you're after, you might
want to give them a visit.
Talk1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>If you go north, you'll head straight into
a wide-open snowfield.

<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Happy_01>Get this—folks say there's a <clr:0000>giant picture<clr:ffff>
in the snow.<sp:5:0:0> Strange, right?

It's certainly an odd tale the Rito have
spun up, but there you have it.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>It's a pity we'll never know the truth of it.
A <clr:0000>big, flying monster<clr:ffff> showed up and is
winging its way around the snowfield.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>So watch yourself if you head that way!
Talk1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>The east, you say? Well...


If you look southeast, you'll see an <clr:0000>old
ruin <clr:ffff>in the bottom of the valley. I don't
know who built it and when,<sp:5:0:0> but it's big.
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Chat_00>I bet something like that was constructed
for some kind of special purpose.

<sp:3:0:2:0001>You should take a look! Just be careful
getting there. A fall down that steep valley
won't do your bones any favors.
Talk2021:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>Oh.<sp:5:0:0> It looks like you're carrying plenty
already.

If you don't mind making room, I can give
you some <clr:0000>medicine<clr:ffff> for your journey.
Talk3004_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>Strange, I thought there used to be more
musicians in the group. <sp:5:0:0>Ah, well. I'm just
glad we have some music again.
Talk1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>If you find yourself lost out on the road,
feel free to stop in.

I'm always happy to stick my nose into
someone else's business if it means
I can help.
Talk2022:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>Let me know when you've made room,
and I can give you some useful <clr:0000>medicine<clr:ffff>.
Talk2023:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Think_01>Made some room, have you? Then please,
take this.
Talk1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>West, eh? Well, that's the direction of
<clr:0000>Rito Village<clr:ffff>, for one thing.

<sp:3:0:2:0101>Oh, while I'm on the topic, might I ask if
you've visited the <clr:0000>Lucky Clover Gazette<clr:ffff>?
It was just established right near there.
I hear their reporters are dogged in their
pursuit of the news. They travel all across
the land to find the biggest scoops!
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_00>If it's information you're after, you might
want to give them a visit.
Talk1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>If you ever get lost, traveler, you're
always welcome to come in and rest
your weary feet.
Talk3001:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_00>What's this? A traveler? We don't get
many of you out here.
Talk3002:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_00>What's this? A traveler? We don't get
many of you out here. And so early too!
Talk2001:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_01>We don't get too many travelers out here.
Thanks for coming out.

<sp:3:0:2:0001>Now, I don't want you to be disappointed,
so you should know that the <clr:0000>musical
troupe<clr:ffff> isn't here right now.
Talk3003:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_00>What's this? A traveler? We don't get
many of you out here. Especially so late!
Talk2002:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_01>Yes, sir.<sp:5:1:0> They're a fine group of
performers.<sp:0:4:0>They're one of the few things that would
bring folks to the stable, in fact.
Talk2031:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>How are we going to entertain our visitors
without the <clr:0000>troupe's music<clr:ffff>? I hope they
come back from <clr:0000>Woodland Stable<clr:ffff> soon.
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>But enough of that. Won't you warm up by
our fire?
Talk3004:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Please, warm yourself by the fire and
enjoy some music.
Talk2003:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>Last I saw them, they were heading
northeast to <clr:0000>Woodland Stable <clr:ffff>in Eldin.

I miss the days when I could warm chilly
visitors with a fire and a good show...

But without that troupe,<sp:5:0:0> even the <clr:0000>Great
Fairy<clr:ffff> that blesses travelers has hidden
herself away.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>What if we don't have enough to offer?
What a sorry end to this stable that
would be.
Talk2032:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_00>Ah, you've come back! Welcome!


<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I'm sorry to say the <clr:0000>musical troupe<clr:ffff>
hasn't returned, so the <clr:0000>Great Fairy<clr:ffff>
is still hidden away...
I hope they come back from <clr:0000>Woodland
Stable<clr:ffff> soon. Surely Eldin can't be
that interesting.
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_01>We may not have all our usual amenities,
but I can at least offer you a warm fire.
Talk3005:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_00>By the way, do you know where you're
going? It can be disheartening to travel
an unfamiliar path.
I've been out here a long time, and I'm
happy to point you in the right direction,
if you're so inclined.
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_01>The places of note around here are to the
west, the east, and the north... So, where
are you headed, traveler?
Talk2004: <snd:Think_00>It might be hard to see in the snow...
Talk2005: <snd:Think_00>It might be hard to see in the dark...
Talk2006:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>There's a <clr:0000>Great Fairy<clr:ffff> over there in a
flower bud halfway up that mountain.

But just a few days after <clr:0000>the Upheaval<clr:ffff>,<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
she went into that bud and hasn't
come out.
Talk3008:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_00>Greetings, traveler. You're welcome no
matter how late it is.
Talk2007:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Chat_00>If she could only hear the musical troupe
play again, I'm sure she'd show herself...

Ah,<sp:5:0:0> but none of this is your problem.
Please, take this for hearing me out.
Talk2008:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Chat_00>Since you came all the way out,<sp:5:0:0> please
take this.
Talk2009:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Happy_00>And don't you think of leaving until you're
prepared! <sp:5:1:0>The fire's here to warm you up.
Talk3011:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_01>I'm sorry the musical troupe's not here.
They went to play at another stable.

<clr:0000>Dueling Peaks <clr:ffff>to the southeast, they said.<sp:5:1:0>
Or was it <clr:0000>Outskirt Stable <clr:ffff>to the south?<sp:5:1:0> 
Hm, I can't recall...
<snd:Sad_00>Anyway, sorry you missed them.
Hopefully the comfort of that warm fire
can help make up for it.
Talk3012:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>I'm sorry the musical troupe's not here.
They went to play at another stable.

<clr:0000>Dueling Peaks <clr:ffff>to the southeast, they said.<sp:5:1:0>
Or was it <clr:0000>Outskirt Stable <clr:ffff>to the south?<sp:5:1:0> 
Hm, I can't recall...
I know this area like the back of my hand,
but I'll admit, I'm not too familiar with
other parts of Hyrule.
